clusterList.phrase: the shelter design lends itself to outbreaks but even if we have a new state-of-the-art shelter we could still face outbreaks but hopefully reduce the likelihood
i have nothing against a new shelter if we get enough funds but the best thing you can do is to avoid putting the shelter in different areas

we have 25 apartments for families who are turning their lives around we have three emergency shelters for people who are homeless at the moment and we have about 100 people in the three emergency shelters two for families and one for single men
